pages.title: Razor Edge
pages.text: Everything here seems to have the livelihood to pierce you open. Not the most inviting place to be.
Even the ground: Parched and razor sharp due to lack of light and water - hence the name.
Little mean plants that sting immensely when you make contact with them.
$(italic)Those are tearing you apart.$()$(br2)Well, your clothes, for the most part. But still, point stands.
